coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Small engraved lettering informs you that these piercings were made by 'Norin'. Repurposed by 'Fortilicious'.
coreAttributes.name: horn chains
coreAttributes.description: A pair of rings linked by a fine metal chain. If you have horns, you can just slide the larger rings onto them to have a dangling decoration between your horns or just let it dangle off of one horn. Nifty! Just try not to think about the fact that these used to be nipple chains. Or maybe do, there's all sorts of kinks out there and who's to judge you?

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] a pair of chained nipple rings into [npc.her] [npc.horn+].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] a pair of chained nipple rings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.horn+].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] a pair of chained nipple rings into [npc2.namePos] [npc.horn+], giving the chain a rough tug.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] a pair of chained horn rings off of [npc.her] [npc.horn+].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] a pair of chained horn rings off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.horn+].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(give)] [npc2.NamePos] chained horn rings a tough tug before sliding them off.
